image.altText: A man looking upset sitting on a couch.

image.altText: Hundreds of people stand outside looking toward three bodies which have been wrapped in a white and red cloth

image.altText: A composite photo featuring US president Donald Trump and a cooked piece of steak.

image.altText: A hole in the door, messy on the floor, dirty carpet and broken furniture are visible

image.altText: Group of men sitting on chairs with eyes closed, folded hands in laps.

image.altText: A Sam Lim corflute on a path with a Howard Ong corflute in the background.

image.altText: A family portrait of mum, dad and a kid taken on a street with houses in the background.
